Commands.Chainspell: 2-hit magic BRV attack  Deals extra damage to debuffed targets  High turn rate
Commands.Lance of Atrophy: 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack  Target: 3 turns ATK Down I, DEF Down I, MAX BRV Down I  Deals extra damage to debuffed targets
Commands.Requiem: 3-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack  Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target  Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets  Deals proportionate HP damage to each target

Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Chainspell Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Chainspell.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Lance of Atrophy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Lance of Atrophy.
Passives.Chainspell Charge: Increases the max uses of Chainspell by 1.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Lance of Atrophy Charge: Increases the max uses of Lance of Atrophy by 1.
Passives.Blessing of Anima: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense when HP is under 50%.
Passives.Debuff Attack Speed: Slightly raises ATK, SPD while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Chainspell Extension: When using Chainspell:   Slight damage boost   Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit   Target: 5 turns INT BRV Down IIAfter using Chainspell:   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (damage boost; deals extra damage to debuffed targets) for 5 turns
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Lance of Atrophy Extension: When using Lance of Atrophy:   Moderate BRV damage boost   Slight boost to effects inflictedAfter using Lance of Atrophy:   Triggers additional Chainspell when target's HP 50% of MAX or less

Weapons.Mortibody Staff CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Requiem.
Weapons.Seymour's Staff CP: 15: Increases Chainspell's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Summoner's Great Staff CP: 35: Increases Lance of Atrophy's potency.Extends the duration of all debuffs inflicted by Lance of Atrophy and increases their potency.
